content: "Zelda, today I want salami, falafel, pizza, bacon, curry, porridge, vegetables, olives, potatoes, chips, corn, Tic Tacs, muffins, bananas, fish, turkey, chicken, cake, and wheat thins for dinner. So what's for dinner?" "He he, nothing, Father!" "Shut the hell up, you piece of crap, do you mean I'm not eating dinner?!" "Yeah, we got a new king. It's Ganon!" "You are my prisoner!" "Oh crap."
translations: ita:Zelda, oggi voglio salame, falafel, pizza, bacon, curry, porridge, verdure, olive, patate, patatine, mais, Tic Tac, muff
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Ooneykcall (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
